trans-unit.source: Enables you to specify multiple fields for display, per item in an object list.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

Much of the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>, including support for templated rendering through device template sets and internal pagination, is similar to the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的行为<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>，包括支持通过设备模板集和内部分页的模板化呈现，为的行为类似<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Introduction to the ObjectList Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/527ca783-0ff9-4247-b407-8e58d093faa9) or the [Pagination](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2) documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ObjectList 控件简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/527ca783-0ff9-4247-b407-8e58d093faa9)或[分页](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)文档。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an array of a user-defined class and then bind it to an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object when the page loads.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建用户定义的类的数组，然后将其绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>对象加载页面时。

trans-unit.source: It also shows how the list and details views display the commands.
trans-unit.target: 它还显示列表和详细信息视图显示命令的方式。

trans-unit.source: For this example, there is also a button that displays a form with a list of all the fields using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例，还有一个按钮，显示使用的所有字段的列表形式<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: This is a sample Web.config file with several device specific filters.
trans-unit.target: 这是包含多个设备特定筛选器的示例 Web.config 文件。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用于在托管环境中操作。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />;权限值： <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> class.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
None.
Notifies the server control that an element, either XML or HTML, was parsed, and adds the element to the server control's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> property.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Returns the collection of all fields from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> class, whether explicit or automatically generated.
The default value is the collection of automatically generated fields.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection" /> object containing all fields in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection" />对象，其中包含中的所有字段<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />。

trans-unit.source: This collection is available only after data binding.
trans-unit.target: 此集合仅在数据绑定之后才可用。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Fields%2A> collection, you cannot add or remove items in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Fields%2A>集合，无法添加或删除此集合中的项。

trans-unit.source: By default, this collection is the set of automatically generated fields.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此集合是的自动生成的字段集。

trans-unit.source: If any fields are explicitly defined, they are contained after any automatically generated fields.
trans-unit.target: 如果显式定义任何字段，且包含在任何自动生成字段的后面。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields%2A> property to list all the fields of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields%2A>属性可以列出的所有字段<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例的一个更大的示例摘自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>概述。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether fields must be automatically generated from data.
When enabled, each public property of the data becomes a field of the control.
The default value is <see langword="true" />.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
<see langword="true" /> if the fields are automatically generated from data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果从数据; 自动生成字段否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When `true`, the object list handles the fields order in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 当`true`，对象列表处理中的字段顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: When `false`, you must specify the order of the fields and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.DataItem%2A> property to bind to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 当`false`，你必须指定字段的顺序，并将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.DataItem%2A>属性将绑定到数据源。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AutoGenerateFields%2A> property to statically associate the fields with their collection in the Details view of an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AutoGenerateFields%2A>以静态方式与它们的详细信息视图中的集合相关联字段属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text used for the command to return from the <see langword="Details" /> view (accessed through a softkey or link).
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The text used for the command to return from the <see langword="Details" /> view.
trans-unit.target: 命令用于从返回的文本<see langword="Details" />视图。

trans-unit.source: The default text is "Back".
trans-unit.target: 默认文本为"上一步"。

trans-unit.source: This label is displayed on WAP browsers and in HTML view.
trans-unit.target: 此标签显示在 WAP 浏览器和在 HTML 视图中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of commands in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> object.
Initially, the collection is empty.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The collection of commands in the object list.
trans-unit.target: 在对象列表中的命令的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style used for the object list commands.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The style used for the object list commands.
trans-unit.target: 使用对象列表命令的样式。

trans-unit.source: If this property is programmatically set, it is not persisted unless the property is set dynamically on each request.
trans-unit.target: 如果以编程方式设置此属性，它不被持久化除非每次请求时进行动态设置。

trans-unit.source: If the property is set declaratively, the property is set on each request.
trans-unit.target: 如果以声明方式设置该属性，每个请求上设置属性。

trans-unit.source: There is no default.
trans-unit.target: 没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Since different devices have different requirements for styles.
trans-unit.target: 由于不同的设备具有不同样式的要求。

trans-unit.source: You may want several <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.DeviceSpecific%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CommandStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可能需要若干<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.DeviceSpecific%2A>设置<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CommandStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to the use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CommandStyle%2A> property to set the style of an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> using a declarative <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific> section to specify different <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CommandStyle%2A> settings for different devices.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CommandStyle%2A>属性可设置的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>使用声明性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific>部分指定不同<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.CommandStyle%2A>适用于不同设备的设置。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: This is a sample Web.config file with several device specific filters.
trans-unit.target: 这是包含多个设备特定筛选器的示例 Web.config 文件。

trans-unit.source: The specified source of the data.
Automatically generates fields for the given data.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Notifies server controls to create any child controls in preparation for posting back or rendering.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The list item to bind.
Creates a list item to contain the object and binds it to the specified object.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
An object list item created from the specified object.
Inheriting classes can override this method to provide a different way of creating an item, or can call this method to construct an item.
trans-unit.target: 继承的类可以重写该方法以提供另一种方法创建一个项，也可以调用此方法来构造项。

trans-unit.source: The source from which items in the collection are created.
Creates items in an items collection from the specified <paramref name="dataSource" /> parameter.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Inheriting classes can override this method for custom data-binding behavior.
trans-unit.target: 继承类可以重写此方法用于自定义数据绑定行为。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the instantiated templates must bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).
Returns <see langword="false" /> if the templates must not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to have them filled in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).
Constructs the details view for the current item by using the <see langword="ItemDetailsTemplate" />.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Called by device adapters when rendering templates.
trans-unit.target: 呈现模板时，由设备适配器调用。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the instantiated templates must bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).
Returns <see langword="false" /> if the templates must not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to have them filled in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).
Constructs the list view by building templates.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Called by device adapters when rendering templates.
trans-unit.target: 呈现模板时，由设备适配器调用。

trans-unit.source: Binds a data source to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Gets or sets the data member to extract when data binding to a list data source.
The default value is an empty string ("").
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The data member to extract from the data source when data binding to an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
trans-unit.target: 要从数据中提取的数据成员绑定到数据源时<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is only used if the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataSource%2A> property is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, rather than of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅使用此属性的值<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataSource%2A>属性属于类型<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>，而不是类型<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source of the list that is being bound.
The default value is null.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The data source of the list that is being bound.
trans-unit.target: 数据源的要绑定的列表中。

trans-unit.source: To bind a data source to a list, you must first use the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataBind%2A> method to ensure data binding.
trans-unit.target: 若要将数据源绑定到列表中，必须先使用控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataBind%2A>方法，以确保数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: The data source can be of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> or of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>.
trans-unit.target: 数据源可以是类型<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>或类型的<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>。

trans-unit.source: If the data source is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataMember%2A> field to specify which member to extract.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源的类型<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DataMember%2A>字段来指定要提取的成员。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the default command.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The name of the default command.
trans-unit.target: 默认命令的名称。

trans-unit.source: When set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control attempts to render a shortcut to invoke the default command.
trans-unit.target: 设置时，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控件尝试呈现的快捷方式来调用默认命令。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, the default rendering in list view displays the first field as a link to the details view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中，在列表视图中的默认呈现显示第一个字段的详细信息视图的链接<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property is set, clicking the link invokes the default command.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>属性设置，则单击该链接时的默认命令，将调用。

trans-unit.source: Invoking the default command raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 调用的默认命令引发<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs> object is set to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>对象设置的值为<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Even if a default command is defined, you should include a command with the same name in the commands collection.
trans-unit.target: 即使定义的默认命令，你应在命令集合包含具有相同名称的命令。

trans-unit.source: If the control cannot render a graphical element that includes a shortcut for the default command, the default command is still available through the rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> commands collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件无法呈现图形元素，其中包含的默认命令的快捷方式，则默认命令是仍可通过的呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>命令集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the panel that contains a device-specific details view.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
A panel that contains a device-specific details view.
trans-unit.target: 包含特定于设备的详细信息视图的面板。

trans-unit.source: The details view has a table that lists each field title and value.
trans-unit.target: 详细信息视图有一个表，其中列出了每个字段的标题和值。

trans-unit.source: In addition, it lists all the commands associated with an item.
trans-unit.target: 此外，它列出与项目关联的所有命令。

trans-unit.source: For some devices, this view also contains a link that returns the user to the list view.
trans-unit.target: 对于某些设备，此视图还包含一个链接，以使用户返回到列表视图。

trans-unit.source: the current view is not the details view.
Gets or sets the text used for the menu item that shows the details view.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The text used for the menu item that shows the details view.
trans-unit.target: 用于显示详细信息视图的菜单项的文本。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set a string that is longer than can be displayed, the default value is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置超过可以显示的字符串，将显示默认值。

trans-unit.source: The default text is "Go".
trans-unit.target: 默认文本为"Go"。

trans-unit.source: This label is displayed only on WAP browsers.
trans-unit.target: 仅在 WAP 浏览器上显示此标签。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the server control contains child controls.
If it does not, it creates child controls.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Use this method to ensure that the templates are instantiated to allow programmatic access to the instantiated contents of a template.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Gets the collection of explicitly defined fields in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection" /> class.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The collection of explicitly defined fields for the object list control.
trans-unit.target: 显式定义的字段的对象列表控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can add or remove fields in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.AddAt%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加或删除集合中的字段，通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.AddAt%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.Remove%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListFieldCollection>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> control has an event handler registered for the appropriate <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand" /> event.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

<see langword="true" /> if the object list control has an event handler registered for the appropriate <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand" /> event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 对象列表控件是否具有为相应注册一个事件处理程序<see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand" />事件; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the control.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
None.
trans-unit.target: 无。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user selects a command that is associated with an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> item.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

When an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event handler is defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> notifies the handler when an item event is generated through user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>定义事件处理程序，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>项事件生成通过用户交互时通知该处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When you render an object list by using templates, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event handler is called through the event-bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 当通过使用模板，呈现的对象列表<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>通过 ASP.NET 事件冒泡机制调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is passed an argument of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>, which contains information about the source item and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the control that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序传递的类型自变量<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>，其中包含有关源项的信息和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>生成事件的控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to render a single item with multiple associated interactions.
trans-unit.target: 这可以呈现具有多个关联交互的单个项。

trans-unit.source: On default rendering, the control renders each of the commands defined for the object list as a link.
trans-unit.target: 默认呈现时，该控件呈现每个命令定义为链接的对象列表。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks a link, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event handler is called with an argument of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>, which contains information about the source item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击一个链接，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>用类型自变量调用事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs>，其中包含有关源项的信息。

trans-unit.source: The value in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property is the name of the command that the user invoked.
trans-unit.target: 中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>属性是用户调用该命令的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to trap the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何捕获<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property specifies what action to perform.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>属性指定要执行什么操作。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> is bound to data.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
When an item in an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> is created and data-bound, this event handler sets the properties of the list item from arbitrary expressions.
trans-unit.target: 中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>创建和数据绑定，此事件处理程序设置列表项的属性从任意表达式。

trans-unit.source: An item in an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control is of type <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItem>.
trans-unit.target: 中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控件是类型<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItem>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use either the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.ListItem%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.DataItem%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs> collection to determine further action.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.ListItem%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs.DataItem%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs>集合以确定进一步操作。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例的一个更大的示例摘自<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>概述。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of items in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItemCollection" /> list.
The default value is an empty collection.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The collection of items in the object list.
trans-unit.target: 在对象列表中的项的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can inspect the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItemCollection> collection, but you cannot modify the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检查中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListItemCollection>集合，但你无法修改该集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user selects an item from a list view.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
This event is called before the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event is called.
trans-unit.target: 此事件之前调用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>事件时调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value (the name or data field) that identifies the field to use as a label for each item.
The default value is empty, which causes the first field in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields" /> collection to be used as a label for each item.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The name or data field that identifies the field to use as a label for each item.
trans-unit.target: 标识要用作每个项的标签的字段名称或数据字段。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the list view is shown as a table.
trans-unit.target: 如果列表视图显示为表，则忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: For a code sample, see the example in <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例，请参阅中的示例<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields" /> collection of the field that has been set by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.LabelField" /> property.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The index within the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields" /> collection of the field that is used as the label.
trans-unit.target: 中的索引<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields" />用作标签的字段的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is zero.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.LabelField%2A> property has not been set, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.LabelFieldIndex%2A> returns zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.LabelField%2A>未设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.LabelFieldIndex%2A>返回零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style used for the header label.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The style used for the header label.
trans-unit.target: 用于标题标签的样式。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property in code is not persisted between requests, so if you want the style to be consistently set, you must set the property on each request.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中设置此属性不会保留之间请求，因此如果你想要设置的一致性的样式，你必须在每个请求上设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the property is set declaratively, the property is persisted between requests.
trans-unit.target: 如果以声明方式设置该属性，则保持属性的请求之间。

trans-unit.source: In addition, setting the property declaratively allows you to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific>/`Choice` structure to set the property for various devices.
trans-unit.target: 此外，以声明方式设置属性让你能够使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific> / `Choice`结构来设置各种设备的属性。

trans-unit.source: None.
Loads private view state.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
None.
Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.SaveViewState" /> method.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Gets or sets the text string used for the <see langword="More" /> link used on HTML browsers to navigate to the details view.
The default is <see langword="More" /> or the localized equivalent.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The text string used for the <see langword="More" /> link used on HTML browsers to navigate to the details view.
trans-unit.target: 用于的文本字符串<see langword="More" />使用 HTML 浏览器上导航到的详细信息视图的链接。

trans-unit.source: The `More` link is rendered to provide a link from the `ListView` of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> to the `DetailsView` of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: `More`链接呈现以提供从链接`ListView`的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>到`DetailsView`的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。

trans-unit.source: The following conditions must be met for the `More` link to be rendered:
trans-unit.target: 必须满足以下条件的`More`要呈现的链接：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property must be set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>属性必须设置。

trans-unit.source: There must be additional fields or commands to be rendered in the details view.
trans-unit.target: 必须有其他字段或命令要在详细信息视图中呈现。

trans-unit.source: The default rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> displays the first field in the `ListView` as a link to the `DetailsView` page.
trans-unit.target: 默认呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>显示中的第一个字段`ListView`指向链接的形式`DetailsView`页。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A> property overrides this link and causes it to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DefaultCommand%2A>属性重写此链接，并使其引发<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the `More` link is rendered to provide a link to the `DetailsView`.
trans-unit.target: 因此，`More`呈现链接时提供的链接`DetailsView`。

trans-unit.source: This property is not the same as the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DetailsCommandText%2A> property, which is used on WAP browsers.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不是相同<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.DetailsCommandText%2A>属性，用于在 WAP 浏览器上使用。

trans-unit.source: None.
None.
Determines whether the event for the server control is passed up the page's UI server control hierarchy.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
None.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> event.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
This method notifies a server control to perform any logic for binding data that is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通知服务器控件，若要执行的任何逻辑，用于将与之关联的数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: If you want to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event, you should override this event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要处理<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>事件，应重写此事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that all delegates attached to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event are invoked.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保所有委托都附加到<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>事件调用。

trans-unit.source: the data source provided no data to bind to.
An object (defined by <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs" />) that contains event data.
Called when a list item generates an event as a result of user interaction.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand>事件。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks.
trans-unit.target: 继承类可以重写此方法以执行其他任务。

trans-unit.source: An object (defined by <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListDataBindEventArgs" />) that contains event data.
Called when a list item is data bound.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind> event.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemDataBind>事件。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks.
trans-unit.target: 继承类可以重写此方法以执行其他任务。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListSelectEventArgs" /> object that contains event data.
Called after the user selects an item.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemSelect> event.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemSelect>事件。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this method to retrieve the required data.
trans-unit.target: 继承类可以重写此方法以检索所需的数据。

trans-unit.source: None.
Called when the control is custom paginated and needs more data.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
None.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
An object defined by an <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains event data.
Called prior to showing the set of commands for a list item.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The default implementation raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>事件。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks.
trans-unit.target: 继承类可以重写此方法以执行其他任务。

trans-unit.source: The index reference for the item.

Prepares the set of commands for a specified item prior to showing it, by calling any event handlers that might be set on the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands" /> event.
Called internally by ASP.NET.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
You would use this method only when writing new device adapters.
trans-unit.target: 仅在编写新的设备适配器时，将使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The index reference for the item.
Called to raise an event for the default command associated with the specified item.
Called internally by the ASP.NET.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
This method can be used by adapters.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以由适配器使用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents an optional event argument to be passed to the event handler.
Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> object of a postback event.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Saves any private view-state changes that have occurred since the page was loaded from persistence.
If no changes were made, this method returns <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
None.
Saves any server control view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
None.
Returns the index of the selected item.
The default value is <see langword="-1" />.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The index of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 所选的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Multiple selections are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持多个选择。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `-1` to clear the selection.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为`-1`以清除该选项。

trans-unit.source: an attempt to clear this property was made while the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ViewMode" /> property was not set to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode.List" />.
the value is less than zero or larger than or equal to the number of items in the list.
Returns the selected item, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no selection.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The selected item, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no selection.
trans-unit.target: 所选的项目，或<see langword="null" />如果未选择任何内容。

trans-unit.source: Multiple selections are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持多个选择。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the item to test.
Contains <see langword="true" /> if more than one item can be selected.
Otherwise, it contains <see langword="false" />.
Tests whether an item in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> is selected.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
<see langword="true" /> if item is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets the text used for the command to select more items in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The text used for the command to select more items in an object list.
trans-unit.target: 命令用于为对象列表中选择多个项目的文本。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the commands related to an item in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> are shown.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The event argument contains a reference to the item and to the collection of commands.
trans-unit.target: 事件自变量包含到项和命令的集合的引用。

trans-unit.source: An event handler can customize the collection according to the item.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序可以自定义根据项的集合。

trans-unit.source: Applications can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event to provide functionality equivalent to item-specific shortcut menus.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>事件，以便提供等效于特定项的快捷菜单的功能。

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the collection of commands during this event are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: 对此事件的命令集合所做的更改不会保留。

trans-unit.source: This event is called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemSelect> event is called.
trans-unit.target: 此事件后，会调用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemSelect>事件时调用。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform other tasks before showing the detail view.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件在显示详细信息视图之前执行其他任务。

trans-unit.source: You can add, remove, or rearrange fields, depending on the item selected in the list view.
trans-unit.target: 您可以添加、 删除或重新排列字段，具体取决于在列表视图中选定的项。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event to remove an item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection> of the detail view of an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>要移除的项从事件<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection>的详细信息视图的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。

trans-unit.source: The item to remove is selected in the list view.
trans-unit.target: 在列表视图中选择要移除的项。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。

trans-unit.source: The optional event argument to be passed to the event handler.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" />.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> 实例被强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of indices within the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields" /> collection of the fields in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFields" /> property.
The default value is <see langword="null" />.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
An array of integers representing the indices of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 表示的索引的整数数组<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.AllFields" />集合。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control has not been bound to a data source or no items have been added, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFieldIndices%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控件已不绑定到数据源或已添加任何项，<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFieldIndices%2A>属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which fields are visible when the list view is shown in table mode.
The default value is an empty string ("").
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
A semicolon-delimited list of fields to be displayed when the list view is shown in table mode.
trans-unit.target: 以分号分隔的列表视图显示在表格模式下时要显示的字段列表。

trans-unit.source: This string must be a set of identifiers, separated by semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串必须是一组标识符，用分号分隔。

trans-unit.source: Each identifier indicates the name or data field of the field that will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 每个标识符指示将显示的字段的名称或数据字段。

trans-unit.source: By default, the list view is never shown in table mode unless this property is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，列表视图是永远不会显示在表格模式下除非此属性不为空。

trans-unit.source: For a complete code sample, see the example for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅示例<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>概述。

trans-unit.source: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
This object is accessible through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Gets or sets the view mode of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode" /> value representing the view mode of the object list.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode" />值，该值表示的对象列表视图模式。

trans-unit.source: The following options are available for this property through the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 以下选项均可用于通过此属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Member Name
trans-unit.target: 成员名称

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: This is the default view displayed when the page containing the object list is rendered for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 这是包含对象列表的页面呈现在第一次时显示的默认视图。

trans-unit.source: It consists of either the label fields of the items, or if the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFields%2A> property is not empty, a table with columns corresponding to the table fields and rows for the items.
trans-unit.target: 它包含的项，标签字段或如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.TableFields%2A>属性不为空，具有对应的表字段的列的表和行项。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, this view is combined with the Commands view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the list.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中，此视图是与合并命令视图中，显示为超链接列表下面的命令。

trans-unit.source: When there is more information in the Details view, a hyperlink for each item displaying the Details view is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 时没有详细信息视图中的详细信息，将呈现的详细信息视图显示每个项的超链接。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, this view is combined with the Commands view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the details.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中，此视图是与合并命令视图中，显示为超链接的详细信息的下面的命令。

trans-unit.source: This view is rendered separately only for WML devices.
trans-unit.target: 此视图仅适用于 WML 设备单独呈现。

trans-unit.source: It consists of a menu with the commands of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: 它使用的命令包含一个菜单<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>。

trans-unit.source: For HTML devices, the List view and Details view are each combined with this view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the details or list.
trans-unit.target: 对于 HTML 设备，列表视图和详细信息视图中每个与相结合使用此视图，显示为超链接的详细信息或列表下面的命令。

trans-unit.source: To set this property in code, an item in the list must be selected before setting this property to <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode.Commands> or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode.Details> view.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中设置此属性，列表中的项之前，必须选择将此属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode.Commands>或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode.Details>视图。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property before selecting an item throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将属性设置中选择项之前引发异常。

trans-unit.source: A view mode is persisted in a private view state, so that, regardless of whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object is `true`, the view mode is persisted as a private field.
trans-unit.target: 视图模式保持不变处于私有视图状态，因此，而不管是否<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>对象是`true`，作为私有字段保留视图模式。

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is `false`, the items collection is not persisted between requests, requiring a data bind to be repeated for each request.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>属性是`false`，请求，需要为每个请求重复的数据绑定之间不保留项集合。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode.List" /> while no item was selected.
